entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023
